last_episode_to_air.name: Toddlers
last_episode_to_air.overview: Researchers reveal the social skills that toddlers naturally possess, abilities that ultimately separate humans from all other species.

name: Babies
overview: From nature to nurture, this docuseries explores the groundbreaking science that reveals how infants discover life during their very first year.

episodes.name: Love
episodes.overview: The biology of bonding unravels to reveal how caregiving, social interaction and stress can physically change both parent and newborn.

episodes.name: First Food
episodes.overview: Proving babies truly are what they eat, researchers discuss how breast milk, iron and microbes can enrich, nourish and protect offspring.

episodes.name: Crawling
episodes.overview: From how they grow to how they go, three scientists find out that crawling is much more than just a transitional phase.

episodes.name: First Words
episodes.overview: Experts examine the rhythm and flow of language and explore how babies break down linguistic beats before they know how to speak.

episodes.name: Sleep
episodes.overview: Researchers delve into sleep, a dynamic time for babies, with studies on twitching, apps and naps.

episodes.name: First Steps
episodes.overview: Scientists venture into the ways that walking changes a baby's world and unveil findings on neonatal reflexes, skeletal development and talking.

episodes.name: What Babies Know
episodes.overview: Challenging the notion of a blank slate, three studies explore how babies are born with expectations about everyday life.

episodes.name: Movement
episodes.overview: From curiosity to understanding: researchers unveil the surprising ways that infants learn how to anticipate and respond to the movements of others.

episodes.name: Senses
episodes.overview: Several experts make sense of how babies touch, taste and see as they embark on a sensory journey that will shape the rest of their lives.

episodes.name: Relationships
episodes.overview: A coy smile, a puppet show and a pointed finger lead to discoveries in how babies get along with others using humor, morality and shared experiences.

episodes.name: Nature and Nurture
episodes.overview: Resolving the debate of nature versus nurture, three scientists show how genetics and environment work together as infants discover who they are.

episodes.name: Toddlers
episodes.overview: Researchers reveal the social skills that toddlers naturally possess, abilities that ultimately separate humans from all other species.
